232.movie_plot: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

269.movie_plot: Young Indian man Thomas is a nerd in his reservation, wearing oversize glasses and telling everyone stories no-one wants to hear. His parents died in a fire in 1976, and Thomas was saved by...

227.movie_name: Messenger: The Story of Joan of Arc, The (1999)

231.movie_plot: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

248.movie_plot: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

290.movie_name: Return of Martin Guerre, The (Retour de Martin Guerre, Le) (1982)
290.movie_plot: In medieval France, some villagers challenge a man's claim of identity when he (as he says) returns home from some time in the army.

253.movie_plot: Australian outback expert protects his New York love from gangsters who've followed her down under.

247.movie_plot: A martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager.

268.movie_plot: The Muppets' twist on the classic tale.

249.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

239.movie_plot: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

257.movie_plot: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

245.movie_plot: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

256.movie_plot: An unlucky in love nurse finds her life taking a detour when her mother places a personals ad in the paper, while on the other side of Boston, a plumber is trying to change careers.

228.movie_plot: Two high school nerds attempt to create the perfect woman, but she turns out to be more than that.

255.movie_plot: The adventures of the sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

240.movie_plot: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

12.movie_plot: Wallace falls for Wendolene, a wool shop owner, while Gromit is framed for the sheep rustling.

63.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)

165.movie_plot: A road comedy about 2 guys whose mission is to beat Lewis and Clark.

92.movie_plot: Two friends, a priest and a rabbi, fall in love with the same woman they knew in their youth, but the religious position of both men denies them romance.

26.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

145.movie_plot: A collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A. A. Milne.

196.movie_plot: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

52.movie_plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

95.movie_plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

21.movie_plot: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

180.movie_plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.
